articles.title: 14-year-old girl fatally shot by LAPD called US 'safest country in the world,' father says - CNN
articles.description: Valentina Orellana-Peralta's dream of becoming an American citizen and studying robotics ended days before Christmas on the dressing room floor of a Los Angeles clothing store, where she was fatally shot by police.
